gtalkletConnectionWarn.message:
Gtalklet use Bidirectional-streams Over Synchronous HTTP (BOSH) to connect to XMPP Servers.
Gtalklet cannot directly connect to talk.google.com or chat.facebook.com
It can only conenct to a XMPP BOSH Connection Manager. Wikipedia »

For security reasons, you should select a reliable Connection Manager provider.
Or, just set up your own one. More »

selectCM.message: Select a Public XMPP BOSH Connection Manager:

gtalkletAccountWarn.message: 2-step verification and application-specific passwords are highly recommended. <a href='http://www.google.com/support/accounts/bin/static.py?page=guide.cs&guide=1056283' target='_blank'>More »<a>

excludesDescription.message:
e.g. http*://mail.google.com/*
This will disable Gtalklet on Gmail.
Enter one URL per line.
